data.name: Harcros Chemicals Inc.
data.description: Harcros has been a trusted resource for our ability to deliver high quality products and solutions to thousands of customers around the world. As a technology driven, employee-owned company, we are consistently driving product development to ensure our solutions are not only innovative but customer-centric.

data.name: Harcros Peracetic Acid (PAA)
data.description: Harcros Peracetic Acid (PAA) is a versatile industrial additive renowned for its dual functionality as both a dechlorination agent and a potent biocide. Widely utilized across various sectors, it plays a crucial role in ensuring effective water treatment, wastewater treatment, municipal wastewater treatment, and in the meticulous processes of metal finishing and manufacturing.

data.name: H-PAC® 4017
data.description: H-PAC® 4017 is a highly effective cationic coagulant for use in industrial and municipal water and wastewater applications for the removal of turbidity, color, suspended solids and phosphorus. It should be stored and handled in suitable non-corrosive materials such as fiberglass, reinforced plastic, PTFE, PVC/CPVC, rubber lined steel or polyethylene.

data.name: Algidet® Q-6040
data.description: Algidet® Q-6040 is a 100% active, alkoxylate nonionic surfactant that exhibits excellent cold water solubility with no gel range. It exhibits fast wetting and detergent properties with controlled foam. Algidet® surfactants are available in a wide HLB range, allowing formulators greater flexibility. They show controlled thickening with anionic systems, making them ideally suited for "super" concentrates. Its applications include laundry detergents, laundry pods, hard surface cleaners, degreasers, automotive detergents, metalworking fluids, and many more.

data.name: Amsul DMAP 60PG
data.description: Amsul DMAP 60PG is a versatile agrochemical surfactant and emulsifier in liquid form. With lipophilic and emulsifying properties, it aids in agricultural pest control.

data.name: T-Soft® L60
data.description: T-Soft® L60 is an anionic detergent that exhibits excellent emulsification, wetting, and foaming properties. It is used in a wide variety of industrial markets; oil and gas, HI and I, construction, and textiles.

data.name: H-Quest® C 100
data.description: H-Quest® C 100 sodium glucoheptonate has many industrial uses as a high-performance chelating agent. Its superior performance in the pH range between 9 and 14 is due to its efficiency in forming stable chelates with divalent and trivalent metal ions such as Ca+2, Mg+2, Fe+2, Fe+3, Zn+2, Al+3, etc.

data.name: WWT 1010
data.description: WWT 1010 is a liquid emulsion. It functions as an industrial flocculant for water treatment in power, water, and utilities applications.

data.name: T-Det® EPO 64
data.description: T-Det® EPO 64 is an anhydrous, liquid nonionic surface-active agent produced by the reaction of ethylene oxide and propylene oxide. This product is a low foaming surfactant and can be used in machine dishwashing formulations, laundry detergents, metal cleaners, textile processing and automotive cleaners.

data.name: T-Det® C 18

summary.name: Certifications & Compliance
items: California Transparency in Supply Chains Act of 2010

summary.name: Synonyms
items: Aromatic castor oil, Ricinus communis oil, Tangantangan oil

data.description: T-Det® C 18 is a liquid nonionic surface-active agent produced by the reaction of castor oil with 18 moles of ethylene oxide. Due to its nonionic structure, it can be combined with both anionic and cationic surface-active agents. T-Det® C 18 is dispersible in water with agitation.

data.seo_title: Harcros Chemicals - Anti Foam - Water Teatment - CASE - Knowde
data.seo_description: Harcros has been a trusted resource for our ability to deliver high quality products and solutions to thousands of customers around the world. As a technology driven, employee-owned company, we are co

featured_products.name: T-Det® PEG 8000 F
featured_products.description: T-Det® PEG 8000 F is a high-molecular-weight polyethylene glycol with a wide range of applications.

featured_products.name: Algidet® Q-6040
featured_products.description: Algidet™ Q-6040 is a 100% active cold water dispersable surfactant ideal for formulating "super" concentrates in a variety of applications.

data.name: T-Soft®
data.seo_description: Knowde is the first marketplace for chemicals, polymers and ingredients. Our leading-edge digital capabilities connect thousands of sellers and buyers every day.

data.name: T-Soft® Amide C
data.description: T Soft® Amide C is a 100% active 1:1 coconut oil based diethanolamine surfactant containing glycerin. Effective as a foam booster and stabilizer, fragrance oil solubilizer and viscosity builder in detergent formulations. T Soft® Amide C is plant derived with high biodegradability and low aquatic toxicity.

data.name: T-Soft® PSMO 20
data.description: T-Soft® PSMO 20 is an oleic acid ester of sorbitol and its mono- and dianhydrides copolymerized with approximately 20 moles of ethylene oxide.

data.name: T-Soft® AOS-40
data.description: T-Soft® AOS-40 is Alfa Olefin Sulfonate Liquid based on thin film continuous sulfonation of high purity C14 olefins, neutralized with sodium ion. It finds use in hair shampoos, toilet bar, detergents and other household cleaners. It is alsoused in textile, leather and agro-chemicalindustry.

data.name: T-Soft® AOS-P
data.description: T-Soft® AOS-P is an Alpha-Olefin Sulfonate Powder (AOS), used for the formulation of a wide variety of hard surface cleaners, personal care products, washing powders, complex soaps and shampoos, and phosphate-free detergents.

data.name: T-Soft® ALS
data.description: T-Soft® ALS, ammonium lauryl sulfate, is a high quality anionic surfactant used in many diverse industrial applications. Manufactured to strict production tolerances, T-Soft® ALS provides formulators with day in, day out consistency, performance, and quality.

data.name: T-Soft® C-30
data.description: T-Soft® C-30 is a high-foaming amphoteric surfactant derived from hydrogenated coconut oil. It is compatible with anionic, nonionic, and cationic surfactants and provides mild cleansing, viscosity building, wetting, and lime-soap dispersing properties. Suitable for both industrial and personal care applications, T Soft™ C-30 can function as a primary or secondary surfactant with foam-boosting capabilities

data.name: T-Soft® L60
data.description: T-Soft® L60 is an anionic detergent that exhibits excellent emulsification, wetting, and foaming properties. It is used in a wide variety of industrial markets; oil and gas, HI and I, construction, and textiles.

data.name: T-Soft® LAO
data.description: T-Soft® LAO is a liquid surfactant designed for use in textile and leather treatments. It offers ease of application and integration into various finishing processes. As part of industrial additives, it enhances the softness and texture of textiles and leather goods. T-Soft® LAO is tailored to meet the demands of modern textile and leather finishing, providing effective surfactant properties for optimal results.

data.name: T-Soft® CB-35
data.description: T-Soft® CB-35 is a high foaming amphoteric surfactant derived from C8-C18 Triglyceride that can be used in industrial and personal care applications. It provides mild cleansing and excellent viscosity building in anionic based systems. Compatible with anionic, nonionic, and cationic surfactants.T-Soft® CB-35 provides wetting, effective lime-soap dispersing and viscosity building properties. It can serve as a primary or secondary surfactant providing foam boosting properties.

data.name: T-Soft® HS
data.description: T-Soft® HS is a cocamidopropyl hydroxysultaine surfactant, used in drilling foams, foam flooding, and gas well unloading. It offers excellent brine tolerance, stable foam production in fresh water and brine, and performs well under high temperatures. Produced with Harcros patented technology.

data.name: T-Soft® ALES-2
data.description: T-Soft® ALES-2 is an ammonium lauryl ether sulfate for the healthcare and emulsion polymerization industries and contains 2 moles of E.O.

data.name: T-Soft® CB 35
data.description: T-Soft® CB 35 is a mild amphoteric surfactant suitable for personal care and household, industrial, and institutional (HI&I) applications. It is compatible with nonionic, cationic, and anionic surfactants.

data.name: T-Soft® 810AB
data.description: T-Soft® 810AB is a low-foaming amphoteric surfactant with excellent coupling properties, suitable for industrial applications containing moderate electrolytes. Soluble in up to 20% caustic solutions and compatible with anionic, nonionic, and cationic surfactants, it is effective in hard and brine water across a wide pH range, serving as a primary or secondary surfactant.

data.name: T-Soft® Amide 2C
data.description: T-Soft® Amide 2C is a 100% active, detergent-grade coconut-based diethanolamine surfactant with a 2:1 modification. It is highly soluble in water, alcohols, and glycols and serves as an effective foam booster, stabilizer, fragrance oil solubilizer, and viscosity builder in detergent formulations. The product is naturally derived, biodegradable, and exhibits low aquatic toxicity.

WHY_KNOWDE.HEADING: Interact with over 8,000 suppliers, browse their catalogs, access documents and download starter formulations.

SECTION_1.HEADING: Instant access to the most comprehensive product catalog
SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: Browse, search and filter the world's largest catalog of chemicals, ingredients and polymers.

SECTION_2.HEADING: Talk directly to suppliers' experts
SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Ask technical product questions, talk to a sales rep and inquire about pricing.

SECTION_3.HEADING: Order samples, request documents, and get quotes
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: Knowde concierge will handle all the details and ensure your requests are handled faster than ever.

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
